categories: Category:Articles known by rank or affiliation

nodes.text: The Alliance I Captain was a military officer in the service of the Galactic Republic Navy, during the Freedon Nadd Uprising of 3998 BBY.
During the Second Battle of Onderon, he held command alongside Jedi Knight Nomi Sunrider of the Republic command ship Alliance I. He personally followed Nomi Sunrider to the surface of Onderon.
